text: Hello! Today I'm here with you because I cannot do my work anymorein my current state.
To start hypnosis, sing your <b><color=red> pendulum !
You have alimited ammount of time to hypnotise your customers !
If this time is up, ils customers will lose their trust in you and go without paying!
Your pendulum can make this time go slower..
Talk with your customers to keep their trust and find how to hypnotise them !
What's the matter ?
Take a chewing gum.
<textjump=0.25|2|5>People keep coming to me asking <uppercaps>for crap.
<textjump=0.25|2|5>All day long, it's a real pain in the ass!
Watch out! Most of your customers will talk to you about useless topics, try to avoid them as much as possible so you won't lose time!
It's up to you to choose the best answers and questions to gain the maximum amount of time!
What kind of requests ?
And that's the problem here ?
A chocolatier complains all the time! A father wants me to solve his family problems! I have to organize school trips. Opticians won't stop bothering me with their stupid problems.
yeah in fact it sounds bothering.
Did you consider moving to a different place ?
I beg you please, hypnotise me so I can finally deal with it! I want to break free!
Ok let's start.
Focus on my watch.
Think about something chill.
Like what ?
Honey.
Administrative papers.
Oh honey! I love honey!
NO! Anything but work please!
I'll think about honey instead.
Now think about somewhere you can relax to.
I'm sorry I can't think of anything. Any idea?
Like in a bakery or at a chocolatier.
Under a tree.
NO PLEASE! Not those chocolatier's stories again.
In the woods, under a tree will be perfect.
Oh yeah, i feel relaxed now.
Finally, try to remember a good memory from your childhood.
As what ?
A school trip!
A birthday party!
A school trip? No It's making me think of my work.
You don't listen to me and you don't understand me at all. You are nothing but a scammer!
Oh! It works, I feel floating!.
At my signal, all your problems will appear insignificant to you. NOW!
Congratulations ! You are now a real psycho-hypnotist!
Do anything in your power to make the world a better place!
